#### Presupuesto para la atenci√≥n a emergencias por desastres

```{r include=FALSE}
folder='departamentos'
fileName='DEPARTAMENTO.shp' # nivel 2 son provincias
fileToRead=file.path(folder,fileName)

library(rgdal)
PeruDepa <- rgdal::readOGR(fileToRead,stringsAsFactors=FALSE)
```

```{r include=FALSE}
data = read.csv("0068.csv")
```

```{r include=FALSE}
names(data) = c("REGION","PIM2018","DEVEN2018","AVANCE2018","PIM2017","DEVEN2017","AVANCE2017","PIM2016","DEVEN2016","AVANCE2016","PIM2015","DEVEN2015","AVANCE2015","PIM2014","DEVEN2014","AVANCE2014","PIM2013","DEVEN2013","AVANCE2013","CLUST_PIM","CLUST_AVANCE")
```

```{r include=FALSE}
data$CLUST_PIM = factor(data$CLUST_PIM, ordered = T, levels = c(1:3))
```

```{r include=FALSE}
data$CLUST_PIM=factor(car::recode(data$CLUST_PIM, "1=3; 2=1; 3=2"), ordered=T)
```

```{r include=FALSE}
data$CLUST_AVANCE = factor(data$CLUST_AVANCE, ordered = T, levels = c(1:3))
```

```{r include=FALSE}
data$CLUST_AVANCE=factor(car::recode(data$CLUST_AVANCE, "2=3; 3=2; 1=1"), ordered=T)
```

```{r include=FALSE}
x=data[,c(1,20,21)]
```

```{r include=FALSE}
PeruDepa=merge(PeruDepa,x,by.x="DEPARTAMEN", by.y = "REGION",all.x=TRUE)
```

```{r fig.height = 6, echo=FALSE,warning=FALSE}
#Mapa de latente:
paleta=c('seagreen1','gray',"palevioletred1") #colores
plot(PeruDepa,col='white',border=T) 
plot(PeruDepa,
     col=paleta[PeruDepa$CLUST_PIM],
     border='NA',add=T)

legend("right",
       title='Prespuesto para la\natencion a desastres (2013-2018)',
       legend=c(paste0("Bajo"),
                paste0("Medio"),
                paste0("Alto")
                ),
           fill=c('seagreen1','gray',"palevioletred1"),cex=0.8,bty = "n")
```

```{r fig.height = 6, echo=FALSE,warning=FALSE}
#Mapa de latente:
paleta=c('seagreen1','gray',"palevioletred1") #colores
plot(PeruDepa,col='white',border=T) 
plot(PeruDepa,
     col=paleta[PeruDepa$CLUST_AVANCE],
     border='NA',add=T)

legend("right",
       title='Ejecucion presupuestal para la\natencion a desastres (2013-2018)',
       legend=c(paste0("Bajo"),
                paste0("Medio"),
                paste0("Alto")
                ),
           fill=c('seagreen1','gray',"palevioletred1"),cex=0.8,bty = "n")
```

#### 2. FONDES (2017-2019)

```{r include=FALSE}
folder='departamentos'
fileName='DEPARTAMENTO.shp' # nivel 2 son provincias
fileToRead=file.path(folder,fileName)

library(rgdal)
PeruDepa <- rgdal::readOGR(fileToRead,stringsAsFactors=FALSE)
```

```{r include=FALSE}
data=read.csv("FONDES.csv", stringsAsFactors = T)
```

```{r include=FALSE}
names(data) = c("REGION","ASIGNA_2017","AVANCE_2017","ASIGNA_2018","AVANCE_2018","ASIGNA_2019","CLUST")
```

```{r include=FALSE}
data$AVANCE_2017 = substr(data$AVANCE_2017,4,50)
data$AVANCE_2018 = substr(data$AVANCE_2018,4,50)
```

```{r include=FALSE}
data$ASIGNA_2017 = as.numeric(data$ASIGNA_2017)
data$ASIGNA_2018 = as.numeric(data$ASIGNA_2018)
data$ASIGNA_2019 = as.numeric(data$ASIGNA_2019)
data$AVANCE_2017 = as.numeric(data$AVANCE_2017)
data$AVANCE_2018 = as.numeric(data$AVANCE_2018)
```

```{r include=FALSE}
data$CLUST = factor(data$CLUST, ordered = T, levels = c(1:3))
```

```{r include=FALSE}
data$CLUST=factor(car::recode(data$CLUST, "1=2; 3=1; 2=3"), ordered=T)
```

```{r include=FALSE}
etiquetas=c(1,2,3)
data$AVANCE_2017_ORD = cut(data$AVANCE_2017,
                           breaks = 3,
                           labels = etiquetas,
                           ordered_result = T)
```

```{r include=FALSE}
etiquetas=c(1,2,3)
data$AVANCE_2018_ORD = cut(data$AVANCE_2018,
                           breaks = 3,
                           labels = etiquetas,
                           ordered_result = T)
```

```{r include=FALSE}
PeruDepa=merge(PeruDepa,data,by.x="DEPARTAMEN", by.y = "REGION",all.x=TRUE)
```

```{r fig.height = 6, echo=FALSE,warning=FALSE}
#Mapa de latente:
paleta=c("khaki1","gold","goldenrod2","goldenrod4") #colores
plot(PeruDepa,col='white',border=T) 
plot(PeruDepa,
     col=paleta[PeruDepa$CLUST],
     border='NA',add=T)

legend("right",
       title='FONDES (2017-2019)',
       legend=c(paste0("Bajo"),
                paste0("Medio"),
                paste0("Alto")
                ),
           fill=c("khaki1","gold","goldenrod2","goldenrod4"),cex=0.8,bty = "n")
```

```{r fig.height = 6, echo=FALSE,warning=FALSE}
#Mapa de latente:
paleta=c('seagreen1','gray',"palevioletred1") #colores
plot(PeruDepa,col='white',border=T) 
plot(PeruDepa,
     col=paleta[PeruDepa$AVANCE_2017_ORD],
     border='NA',add=T)

legend("right",
       title='Avance FONDES (2017)',
       legend=c(paste0("Bajo"),
                paste0("Medio"),
                paste0("Alto")
                ),
           fill=c('seagreen1','gray',"palevioletred1"),cex=0.8,bty = "n")
```

```{r fig.height = 6, echo=FALSE,warning=FALSE}
#Mapa de latente:
paleta=c('seagreen1','gray',"palevioletred1") #colores
plot(PeruDepa,col='white',border=T) 
plot(PeruDepa,
     col=paleta[PeruDepa$AVANCE_2018_ORD],
     border='NA',add=T)

legend("right",
       title='Avance FONDES (2018)',
       legend=c(paste0("Bajo"),
                paste0("Medio"),
                paste0("Alto")
                ),
           fill=c('seagreen1','gray',"palevioletred1"),cex=0.8,bty = "n")
```
